com.shearosario.tothepathandback

Class ObjectSort<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shearosario.tothepathandback.ObjectSort<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<ObjectSort<T>>

    public class ObjectSort<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<ObjectSort<T>>
    Used to sort an object based on their distance or time from a location.

    Because we need to sort entrances and stations, this class is generic. Only has get methods, and overridden sort method for two of these objects.

    Author:
    shea
